adept.utilities

Class DocumentMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.utilities.DocumentMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITokenizer

    public class DocumentMaker
extends Object
implements ITokenizer
    Implements the white space tokenizer, simple text file parser and provides functionality to create a Document object using the aforementioned utilities.
